RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRINCE OF TRUTH chased just off the inside down the backstretch and then three to four wide through the turn coming under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch and was bumped by BEARY FUNNY looking to tip out to no avail, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole, edged away briefly, then dug in and held safe to prevail. REFUAH coaxed from the gate, chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. BEARY FUNNY chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch and attempted to tip out bumping PRINCE OF TRUTH straightened away and was denied, angled in to the three path and kept on to secure the show honors. FLYING IN STYLE coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside under some pressure from VAUNTED to the outside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch displaced from command and weakened in the late stages. VAUNTED four then three wide in aim of the leader, advanced to press that rival from the outside taking command just inside the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch in command, got displaced by the eventual winner inside the three-sixteenths and weakened to the finish. ESCAPE KEY chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Beary Funny
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 2p near 1/4, bumped foe 4w uppr, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Flying in Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Refuah
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Walder Peter R
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Escape Key
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-5w early, inside turn, 2w 1/4p, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Truth
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, 3-4w turn, 5w upper, up 1/8, edged away, safe

ENTRY.NAME: Vaunted
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w in aim, pressed 3w turn, up ins 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 94. Waiver Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare As sessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE REVENGER showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in and held safe to prevail. HAMMERIN AAMER chased three wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick to latch on the aforementioned foe as he hit the wire. PIT BOSS chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. MY FRIENDS BEER chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. JUMPSTER chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. CONTINENTAL DIVIDE chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpster
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Continental Divide
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, inside turn, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.OWNER: PlayingTheField Racing Final Turn Racing Stable LLC WLIR Racing Stables Acqua No
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: The Revenger
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, edged clear, held safe

ENTRY.NAME: Pit Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, mild bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1 3/16M Outer turf CR: 88. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JAMESTOWN tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the sixteenth marker, dug in and held safe to prevail. SACRED RHYME chased just off the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive offering up a mild kick to secure the place honors. WAR OFFICER chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. TORIGO stumbled at the start, recovered to race forwardly placed along the inside early on, then chased three then two wide in closest aim of the leader, advanced to take back command five-sixteenths from home, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught a sixteenth out, then got outfinished in the late stages. THE JACKAL three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung six wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. CASPIAN SEA (GB) chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, made no late headway. PUJOL raced just off the inside early on before establishing command once in the first turn and took to the inside, showed the way in hand along the inside, yielded the front at the five-sixteenths and continued in the inside route into upper stretch and tired. ABSOLUTE CONTROL (FR) chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, tired. ELEVATED CAUSEWAY broke a half a beat slow, chased four then three wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung five wide for home and tired. COMANCHE PEAK (GB) got away to a hesitant start, bolted soon after the start when displacing some sod appearing to shy out, raced sluggish early on growing detached at the tail of the field, got guided five to six paths off the inside into the backstretch and was eased up before being pulled up near the nine-sixteenths and was subsequently vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Jamestown
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, up 1/16, dug in, safe

ENTRY.NAME: Absolute Control (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 6w upper, kept on

ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitant st, sluggish early,5-6w, eased up, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 3-2w, up 5/16, 3w uppr, caught 1/16,outfinish

ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 slw, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: War Officer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Pujol
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, coaxed 3/8, yielded ins 5/16, ins 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Rhyme
ENTRY.OWNER: Brant Peter M Magnier Mrs John Tabor Michael B Smith Derrick Westerberg and Poul
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 4w upper, dug in, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Caspian Sea (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no late headway

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 96. Claiming Purse 70000. (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $32,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% After care Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGNOLIA MIDNIGHT five then four wide off a duel, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive steadily getting on track to take command seventy yards from home, then inched away late on to the finish. SAGAMORE MISCHIEF led briefly early on before prompting the pace of FLINT RIDGE from the outside four wide, advanced and dueled from the three path through the turn, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was caught seventy yards from the finish. TETSU chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. SCILLY CAY stumbled at the start, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, offered no response. ROYAL TRYST coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to the finish. FLINT RIDGE coaxed from the gate, raced forwardly placed in the two path before taking over command under pressure from the former leader to the outside, tucked inside and had that rival advance outside and knocked heads through the turn, spun just off the inside into upper stretch displaced from the front and weakened in the late stages. BIG BOBBY chased three wide until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six to seven wide into upper stretch, made no headway. LIFE AND LIGHT chased two to three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four wide at the head of the stretch, weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bobby
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo and God's Glory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed ins 3/8, angled 6-7w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Tryst
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Tetsu
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Life and Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Flint Ridge
ENTRY.OWNER: Gurdon Andrew O Poyah Anil and Rodriguez Gustavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, dueled ins turn, 2w 1/4p, weakened late

ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w uppr, no response

ENTRY.COMMENT: led briefly, prompted 4-3w, duel turn, 3w uppr, caught fin 70yds

ENTRY.NAME: Magnolia Midnight
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5-4w off duel, coaxed near 1/4, 6w upper, dug in, up fin 70yds

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU LOOK COLD chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, had to alter out a path a furlong out as RACHEL'S ROCK had to alter to her inside when LADY MILAGRO drifted out, offered up a good finish and caught the once clear leader in the final jumps to the finish. QUICK MUNNY seven paths off the inside forwardly placed down the backstretch, tucked four then three wide advancing on the leader to take command near the quarter pole, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, forged clear under a drive to inside the eighth pole, dug in leg weary and was caught in the final strides to the wire. RACHEL'S ROCK eight paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was forced to alter out when LADY MILAGRO came outwards from along the inside, then offered up a mild kick to secure the show honors. LADY MILAGRO showed the way in hand four then three wide before tucking to the two path into the turn coming under increased pressure to the outside, yielded nearing the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in and was flashed a left handed crop and shied out three to four paths while uncorrected forcing both RACHEL'S ROCK and YOU LOOK COLD to alter out a path a furlong from home, then weakened to the finish. TAMING THE TIGRESS chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. REMAIN ANONYMOUS chased just off the inside until tucked inside into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, offered no response. MORE THAN VOWS coaxed from the start, chased just off the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, went four wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Taming the Tigress
ENTRY.OWNER: Winning Move Stable and Jacobson, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, no response

ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Kahn Alan and Casal Jorge
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3w upper, no response

ENTRY.OWNER: Town and Country Racing LLC and Hidden Brook Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Milagro
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 4-3w, 2p turn, yielded, 2w 1/4p, shied out 1/8, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: You Look Cold
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w uppr, altered 1/8, gd finish, up

ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael and America's Pastime Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 7w backstretch, 4-3w turn, up near 1/4, 3-4w uppr, clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Rachel's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: 8w early, 5w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w uppr, altered 1/8, mild kick

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1M Turf CR: 86. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS SAN GABRIEL showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked inside into the far turn and came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive holding gamely to prevail. ELLE EST FORTE chased three then two wide from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a good finish to secure the place honors. MISS KRISTY two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, got bumped and leaned on from just outside the eighth pole through to the sixteenth marker by MISCREANT attempting to bull her way out and denied the move repeatedly holding her rightful lane and closed well to procure the show honors on the wire. TAP IT UP three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the last major share. DONTMESSWITHTESS three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch, kept on one paced to the finish. MISCREANT tracked the pace along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, attempted to bump and lean on MISS KRISTY repeatedly trying to bull her way out from just outside the eighth pole through to the sixteenth marker and was denied the move, then got forced to steady off the heels of a rival just inside that station and finished evenly to the end. THUNDARA tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home, weakened. DIAMOND STATUS chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. NIGHTSABER (GB) chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and weakened. MORE MANGO chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/16M Outer turf CR: 99. Allowance Purse 100000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REDISTRICTING (GB) tracked just off the inside from just off the pace, tucked inside through the far turn, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, rallied to split foes and seize command just inside the eighth pole, edged clear under a drive and was geared down in the late stages. QUALITY G two to three wide in pursuit, got let out angled five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid, then kept on to secure the place honors. BE OF COURAGE chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, ran on to procure the show honors. CAPTURE THE FLAG chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command at the eighth pole and was collared just inside that station, kept on to the finish. SHADOWED (IRE) chased two to three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid a furlong out, then was under light urging through to the finish. FIGHTER IN THE WIN showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and was collared a furlong out, weakened in the late stages. HEATHGUARD chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. RAMBLIN' WRECK chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, made no impact. MY IMAGINATION chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. BRYCE CANYON chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Mother Goose S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 102. Stakes Purse 250000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $250 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,250 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,250 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,250 in addition to the entry and starting fees) may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third , 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake other than state-bred in 2023 allowed 4 lbs. A Trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, October 14, 2023 with 17 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: XIGERA three then two wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, brushed with DEFINING PURPOSE at the quarter pole and took over command spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, then edged clear under a drive kept to task. DEFINING PURPOSE three wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, offered up a bid and brushed with XIGERA at the quarter pole when cornering three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to chase the winner home while along safe for the place honors. OCCULT just off the inside through the first turn, chased four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking three wide through the far turn getting placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, kept on to be along for the show honors. JULIA SHINING three then two wide through the opening bend, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went five to six wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals and was along well clear of the rest. FOGGY NIGHT coaxed from the gate, chased two to three wide until tucked inside into the far turn, came under coaxing midway, spun two to three wide for home and tired. UNDERVALUED ASSET coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside through the far turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and yielded the front at that station, took the inside route into upper stretch and tired. PEAK POPULARITY chased just off the inside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the two path into upper stretch and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Foggy Night
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2-3w, coaxed ins 3/8, 2-3w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Peak Popularity
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Julia Shining
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w 1st turn, chased 5-4w, coaxed 7/16, 5-6w upper, passed tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, coaxed ins near 1/4, inside 1/4, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st turn, 4-5w backstretch, coaxed 3w 3/8, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Defining Purpose
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 4-3w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, ran on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Awad S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 1/16M Turf CR: 81. Stakes Purse 135000. FOR TWO-YEAR-OLDS. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $135 each which should accompany the nomination; $675 to pass the entry box and an additional $675 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $675 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weight, 122 lbs. Non-winners of a race other than maiden, claiming , starter or state-bred allowance allowed 2 lbs.; all maidens allowed 4 lbs. A presentation will be made to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the main track. Closed Saturday, October 14, 2023 with 19 Original Nominations and 2 Supplements. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on thet
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOVE TO GOLD just off the inside tracking the front from afar near the rear of the main flight, tucked inside at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, angled three wide into upper stretch, tipped out a path rallying to issue a challenge through the final furlong and collared the leader seventy yards from home, then prevailed edging away at the end. SPIRIT PRINCE settled just off the inside tracking the spurting away leader from the two path isolated between that lone rival and the main body of the field in behind, tucked inside into the far turn and came under coaxing at the three-eighths, cornered two to three wide into upper stretch and got first run at the leg weary leader overhauling that foe to take command a furlong out, dug in under a drive under lone threat and was collared with seventy yards to the finish, ran on clear for the place honors. BLUE CREEK tracked the pace along the inside from afar, came under coaxing near the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild kick. INNATE (IRE) tracked the front from afar just off the inside, came under coaxing along the inside at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, kept on one paced to the finish. DANCING MISCHIEF three then two wide in pursuit, got coaxed along at the five-sixteenths, angled six wide into upper stretch and tired. TROPANDHAGEN coaxed from the gate, spurted away along the inside to a commanding lead by the midway point down the backstretch, remained inside through the far turn and into upper stretch coming under coaxing straightened away as the field quickly took closer order, got overhauled nearing the eighth pole and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Innate (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of FAH

ENTRY.OWNER: Lindy Farms and Ice Wine Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed inside 5/16, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Tropandhagen
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, spurted away ins, inside 1/4, overhauled 1/8, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Move to Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, to ins 7/16. 3w upper, closed well, up final 70yds

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Machmer Hall & Mr. & Mrs. Carrie +Craig Brogden

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, coaxed near 5/16, angled 4-5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Dancing Mischief
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and SGV Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, angled 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Spirit Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Oakwood Stables (Daniel J Burke) Krase Scott D Donarra Thoroughbreds LLC Beitz K
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, to ins 7/16, coaxed 3/8, 2-3w uppr, up 1/8, caught

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Forty Niner S. - Grade2 BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 10 1M Dirt CR: 108. Stakes Purse 300000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $300 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,500 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,500 to star t. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $1,500 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to second,1 2% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights: Three year olds, 122. Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake in 2023 allowed 2 lbs.; of a sweepstake other than state-bred in 2023 allowedd 4 lbs. The first three finisher of the Forty Niner will have all fees waive for the Cigar Mile. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, October 14, 2023 with 22 Original Nominations and 1 Supplement.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EVERSO MISCHIEVOUS two to three wide in pursuit, advanced on the leader in tandem with FILM STAR to his outside three furlongs from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch seizing narrow command, dug in under threat from a trio and then a quartet and gamely fended them off to the finish. DR ARDITO chased four then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, kicked on belatedly to just get up for the place honors in the final jump. ACCRETIVE chased five wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went eight wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying willingly through to the finish but was ultimately repelled to the wire. FILM STAR broke in at the start, chased just off the pace four wide down the backstretch before advancing on the leader four to five wide midway on the turn, offered up a bid swinging six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive and weakened in the late stages. SWIFTSURE showed the way in hand along the inside, took to the two path through the turn coming under pressure from a pair midway on the bend, got placed to coaxing in response at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and yielded the front straightened away, then weakened in the late going. BUSINESS MODEL five wide early on, tucked inside with nine-sixteenths to go, came under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and made no impact. DOUBLE CROWN chased along the inside under a ride from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Double Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Everso Mischievous
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, advanced 3/8, up 4w upper, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Accretive
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, coaxed 5/16, 8w upper, dug in, willingly, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Film Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, just off pace 4w, advanced 4-5w 3/8, 6w uppr, wknd lte

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Ardito
ENTRY.OWNER: Caruso Michael J and Dubb Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, angled 5-6w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Swiftsure
ENTRY.OWNER: Liberty House Racing Twenty-Two Stable Club Sixty Five Racing Take a Shot Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, 2p turn, under pressure 3/8, 3w uppr, yielded, wknd

ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w early, to ins 9/16, coaxed ins 7/16, 2w 1/4p, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 11 6F Outer turf CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 36 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CATSKILL HUMOR chased four then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, got let out swinging four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a sixteenth from home, dug in and held on from a late closing rival. NYXED chased two to three wide from mid pack, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, offered up late foot to close in stoutly on the outside but missed at the end. OOLONG HAI (IRE) chased three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on to secure the show honors. MATERIAL WITNESS coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside, got set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a sixteenth from home, weakened in the late stages. LE BEAU chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild bid. WISH LIST chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. WORDS OF PRAISE chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out seven wide into upper stretch, made no headway. RIVIERE coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, cornered just off the inside into upper stretch, offered no response. LIGHTBULB MOMENT chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out five wide into upper stretch, made no impact. KAREN'S BROOMSTICK chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Riviere
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, no response
